column5: Do it need to reserve a camping spot and a place to dock my boat for the G2G.  Thanks.

I would if you want to make sure you get a spot. It's no big deal to reserve one just email Kevin and tell him what you want and dates.  Maybe since I nothing to do with this I shouldn't have answered the question   but then again I try to help where I can.  Cheers
Thanks Whopper.  To bad you cant make it.  I sent lakair an email.

Just spoke to Kevin yesterday... He kept a spot for us, no deposit required.  At $10 a person, 4 nights aught not to dent our wallets too much.  Mind you, the nights will be cool, but the bugs will be nill.  When will you be arriving Glen?  HD
